entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Admiral Ackbar had you send a transmission to General Dodonna on Yavin IV.
entries.journal_entry_description: Activate and protect a communication array so that Admiral Ackbar can send a transmission to General Dodonna on Yavin IV. Make certain that the Empire does not disrupt that transmission.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Activate and protect a communication array so that Admiral Ackbar can send a transmission to General Dodonna on Yavin IV. Make certain that the Empire does not disrupt that transmission.
entries.task00_start_message: Imperial troops are certain to detect this transmission. Do not let them interfere!
